title: Botanical Print No. 1 / SATIN SILK
body_html:
OUR FIRST EDITION of BOTANICAL PRINTS on SATIN SILK RIBBON!!

Starting with a blue base hue crafted from logwood. Depending on the lighting, sometimes the blue looks "sapphire" and other times "periwinkle blue". Then fresh and dried flowers are rolled into the silk to create their prints. The overall feel is magical and somewhat celestial. 

This silk ribbon is created from our premium 100% chemical free silk satin. The heavy weight silk has a satiny front side with a matte finish on the back side. 

weight | 19mm

While all ribbons are created the same, the differences between each ribbon can be quite drastic. The number of markings on each ribbon can vary. See images for a range of possible botanical prints. 

Each ribbon is unique and markings vary on each ribbon.

A unique adornment for your custom bridal bouquet.

title: Botanical Print No. 89 Silk Ribbon
body_html:
Botanical print no. 89 silk ribbon is first hand dyed in a dye bath of Queen Anne’s Lace to create our soft “Queen Anne” hue. Then, plants, flowers, and leaves are rolled into the silk and steamed to create their lasting imprint.

Crafted from Queen Anne’s Lace {whole plant, fresh + dried}, Tansy {fresh leaves}, Golden Rod {fresh whole plant + leaves}, Coreopsis {dried}

This is a fun and unique ribbon. The amber prints from the flowers and chartreuse eco-prints from the leaves make a memorable statement tied on your wedding flowers, incorporated into your fall table decor, creating a bow on your holiday wreath, or gift wrapping a special gift.

Botanical markings on each ribbon vary. 

EACH RIBBON IS ONE-OF-A-KIND — the Art of Nature, captured in lasting form.

Crafted from wild-harvested silk, this 12mm ribbon is a luxurious weight that feels slightly lighter than our classic silk ribbons due to the varying production methods. Exclusively made for Silk & Willow, you will only find this level of quality here. Prepare to be amazed by its unparalleled sheen and sumptuous feel.

title: Moody Marble Silk Ribbon {LIMITED EDITION}
body_html:
Introducing Moody Marble Silk Ribbon - the unconventional silk ribbon. This edgy and grungy ribbon stands out with its one-of-a-kind patterns.

Crafted using natural botanical colors sourced from local walnuts and Cutch, a historical brown dye from the heartwood of the Acacia catechu tree. Through a meticulous process, we spent weeks manipulating the silk in and out of our natural dye baths, resulting in unique and mesmerizing marbling patterns.

Moody Marble features a blend of cool and warm tones. The dominant gray shade has hints of blue undertones and is beautifully swirled in various shades, ranging from light to nearly black. To add an extra touch, subtle brown swirls and marbled patterns are layered over the gray base.

Please note: This ribbon is not for the conventional bride. Each ribbon is wildly different, making it impossible to set expectations, so do not purchase this ribbon with preconceived expectations. If you like to embrace the unexpected this ribbon is for you!

title: Plant Dyed Silk Twilly / Bouquet Wrap
body_html:
Plant Dyed 100% Silk Satin Twilly. 

What is a Twilly? 

The Twilly is an iconic fashion accessory with a rich history. Renowned brand Hermès developed this long and narrow scarf in the 1930s. Made from 100% silk and skillfully sewn together, the Twilly can be used as a stylish fashion accessory or as a protector for bag handles.

Our Twilly is crafted from the highest quality silk satin and dyed with natural plant dyes, creating our unique palette of hues. Use your Twilly to wrap your bridal bouquet on your special day, creating a truly memorable touch. After the celebrations, continue wearing your silk Twilly as a cherished reminder of your unforgettable wedding day.

Use your Twilly as a bouquet Wrap-
Once you secure your bouquet.

  1. You can use a ribbon to cover the stems and secure your twillly with a pin to the front of your bouquet for longer draping tails.
  2. Wrap your twilly around the base of your bouquet and knot it. Secure it with a pin. This will give you medium-length draping tails.
  3. Wrap your twilly around the base of your bouquet and tie a bow. This will create a sweet bow with short tails. 

The Versatile Ways to Wear a Twilly-
Discover versatile ways to elevate your style with a scarf:

  • Classic Style: Wear it elegantly around your neck, either tied in a bow or let the ends hang loose.
  • Chic Accessory: Add a touch of sophistication to your outfit by wearing it tied on your wrist as a wrist bracelet.
  • Trendy Hairpiece: Transform your look by using the twilly as a headband or tied over a ponytail.
  • Fashionable Bag Accent: Give your purse a pop of color by tying the twilly around your bag handle.
  • The options are endless - express your own mood and creativity!

Width / 2.5 inches

Length / 48 inches tip-to-tip

Comes rolled in a 100% silk organza bag.

Note/ Each twilly is plant dyed. While these are mostly solid in color, there may be subtle plant markings from the dyeing process, an unpredictable characteristic as unique and beautiful as nature itself. 

CARE / Hand washing is preferred, but you can wash in the washing machine on a delicate cycle in a mesh bag. Be sure to use chemical-free, pH-neutral laundry soap (we use Seventh Generation). Do not use chemical detergents; they can alter natural hues. Wash on a cold and delicate cycle. After washing, delicately squeeze out water without twisting or wringing. To absorb remaining moisture, roll it in a towel and press out extra water, then lay it flat or hang it to dry. Use the silk setting on your iron or medium heat if ironing is needed. Prolonged exposure to direct sunlight can fade natural hues.

COLORS |
Natural White- A classic off-white hue.
Indigo- Dyed with 100% pure indigo. NOTE / Wash separately, as some color bleeding may occur in the first few washings. 

 

CARE | Machine washable. A delicate washing cycle is recommended (while the blankets can withstand rigorous washing, the tassels may unravel with regular washing; a delicate cycle is recommended). Use cold water. "Natural White" blankets can be washed with other items, but "Indigo" blankets should always be washed separately to avoid a transfer of color. NOTE | These are handmade textiles, and slight imperfections are always possible. They get softer and softer with each washing. Each blanket is pre-washed, and some of the twisted tassels have come undone in the washing process. While this does not take away from the beauty of the blanket, we have discounted our last batch of blankets for this reason.

title: Moon Print Silk Scarf 20 x 20" {Indigo}
body_html:
Botanical Dyed 100% Silk Scarf

Elevate your style effortlessly with this chic and versatile accessory. This luxurious scarf is the ultimate statement piece, perfect for adorning your hair, draping around your neck, or adding a pop of flair to your favorite handbag. Instantly transform your look with the sustainable luxury of botanically dyed color. 

Indigo Moon Block Print. A moon-shaped block print uses a resist dye method to create circular moon-shaped markings after each scarf is dipped in our organic indigo dye vat. Then, each scarf is dip-dyed again in indigo to create varying shades of indigo.

The intensity of the color varies by the time spent in the dye vat. Moon circles vary in intensity. 

Experience softness and luxury in every touch—hand-dyed, slow-crafted botanical color.

Approx. Size | 20 x 19.5 inches

100% habotai silk / weight 12mm / Grade 6A / GOTS certified silk


CARE / Hand washing is preferred, but you can wash in the machine alone or in a mesh bag. Be sure to use chemical-free, pH-neutral laundry soap (we use Seventh Generation), as harsh chemical detergents can alter natural hues. Wash on a cold and gentle cycle. 
Keep your silk scarf looking its best longer by paying attention to how you dry it! After washing, delicately squeeze out water without twisting or wringing. To absorb remaining moisture, roll it in a towel and press out extra water, then lay it flat or hang it to dry for optimal results; alternatively, putting it on low heat setting in the dryer will quickly dry your silk- just be sure not to over-dry as shrinkage may occur. For perfect drying each time, try tumbling on low heat, 10 minutes at a time, checking every interval until it's just done - this will avoid wrinkles with no need for ironing afterward! If ironing is needed, use the silk setting on your iron or medium heat and iron on the back side of the silk (the side with the Silk & Willow logo).
Note / Prolonged exposure to direct sunlight can fade botanical hues. Embrace this quality and a natural process, and don't let this stop you from enjoying your scarf to the fullest. 
Notes | Due to the natural dyeing process, expect color variations. Always wash indigo-dyed scarves separately, as color bleeding can occur. It's best to wait as long as possible to wash, allowing more time for the indigo color to cure. Scarf .04 has a few tiny marks from flower petals.

Comes folded in an organic 100% silk organza bag. Perfect for gifting.

title: TRAVEL JOURNAL
body_html:
Designed and hand-crafted by our friends at Jen Simpson Design. Jen is a celebrated designer of bespoke, luxury wedding stationery. In addition to her stationery collections, Jen has designed a line of journals and cards for any special occasion in life. Her travel journals make a wonderful gift for couples starting their adventures together, graduation gifts, or for anyone looking to document their big adventures!

A space to record memories of wanderlust

This journal was created with the unique adventures of travel in mind. It is designed for you to keep a mindful record of your wanderlust and preserve the vibrant memories that you have made.

Personalize the first interior page with a name, perfect for gifting!

Cover: Chai Latte with navy printing.

  • Map spread to record and visualize the places you have been.

  • 136 pages (68 double-sided)

  • 16 trip segments filled with inspiring questions for reflection.

  • Each trip segment has 1.5 spreads of prompts and 2.5 spreads of open area to free write.
  •  Prompts to record your best memories, favorite things, gratitude, and knowledge that you have gained.

  • Page to list the locations and eateries you love and contact information for new friends you meet.

  • Built with a beautiful thick cover, thick 80# text weight pages, and sturdy tagboard backing.

  • Measures 5.5x8.5 when closed.

  • Spiral bound so it will lay flat to give you ample writing space.

title: Playful Pink
body_html:
Step aside classic Barbie pink – there’s a new pink in town! Playful Pink is a sophisticated and natural take on a classic pink hue. Hand-dyed with sustainable harvested Brazilwood to craft an eye-catching pink shade that looks straight off the Barbie Movie screen.

Perfect for any special occasion, including bridal showers, bachelorette parties, baby showers, and birthday bashes, our Playful Pink silk ribbon is the perfect solution for those wanting to add a fun and playful touch with natural sophistication.

Ideal for Barbie party decor, tying on flower bouquets, tying in hair, wrapping special gifts, or adding bows on party favors. 

Playful Pink is a primarily solid hue, but there may be some marbling of hues. If you prefer a more unique ribbon with extra marbling, request "more marbling" in the notes at checkout and we will do our best to accommodate your request.

title: Coreopsis Auburn  | 100% Silk Scarf | Multiple Sizes
body_html:
ORIGINAL BOTANICAL PRINT, HAND-DYED SILK SCARF

Liven-up your summer and fall wardrobe with our must-have fashion accessory: our coreopsis dyed silk scarves. These scarves add an earthy touch to any outfit, and we have the perfect size for every occasion. Choose a large size for styling and wraps, medium-sized options for your hair, wrist, and handbag, or small pocket squares for a pop of color. Our exclusive, handcrafted silk scarves bring a touch of nature to your wardrobe.

Experience the allure of this unique auburn base hue! Botanical prints are created by rolling four different coreopsis flower varieties into the silk and steaming it with a direct dye method. The silk is then dyed in a bath of rich hues, carefully balanced with various types of coreopsis flowers. Each scarf is truly one-of-a-kind, adding a touch of natural beauty to your ensemble.

Each scarf is presented in a handmade 100% silk organza bag, making it the perfect gift for someone special.

Please note that the botanical prints on each scarf will vary, making each piece a unique work of art. Handcrafted by textile artist Shellie Pomeroy.

Choose from:

100% Silk Habutai /  Grade 6A / GOTS certified silk / approx size 12 x 12 inches. 

100% Silk Habutai /  Grade 6A / GOTS certified silk / approx size 20 x 20 inches. 

100% Silk Habutai /  Grade 6A / GOTS certified silk / approx size 36 x 36 inches. 


Machine hemmed. 

Use our naturally dyed silk scarf as a neck accessory, hair wrap, or tie on your handbag. Check out the Hermès website for loads of inspiration on how to wear silk scarves. 

CARE / Hand washing is preferred, but you can wash in the washing machine on a delicate cycle in a mesh bag. Be sure to use chemical-free, pH-neutral laundry soap (we use Seventh Generation), as harsh chemical detergents can alter natural hues. Wash on a cold and gentle cycle. 
Keep your silk scarf looking its best longer by paying attention to how you dry it! After washing, delicately squeeze out water without twisting or wringing. To absorb remaining moisture, roll it in a towel and press out extra water, then lay it flat or hang it to dry for optimal results; alternatively, putting it on low heat setting in the dryer will quickly dry your silk- just be sure not to over-dry as shrinkage may occur. For perfect drying each time, try tumbling on low heat, 10 minutes at a time, checking every interval until it's just done - this will avoid wrinkles with no need for ironing afterward! If ironing is needed, use the silk setting on your iron or medium heat and iron on the back side of the silk (the side with the Silk & Willow logo).

title: Canyon Sunset Silk Ribbon
body_html:
Canyon Sunset evokes the gradations of evening's last light reflecting off the canyon walls. A rich vibrant apricot-coral color that mimics the coral sandstone hue.

Created from the natural dye Ceriops tagal.

Ceriops tagal, a mangrove tree species, is a vital tree in coastal ecosystems. Mangroves are under tremendous environmental stress from herbicides, runoff, and clear-cutting groves for aquaculture. Ceriops tagal is considered a precious dye sourced from Botanical Colors in collaboration with Threads of Life, who acquired this extract from Indonesia's only mangrove ecosystem to be Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) certified for environmental management and protection. The bark used to create this dye is a by-product of forest management and is used by the concession to increase incomes for people living around the forest.

Paired with Canyon Sunset {Ethereal}, Botanical Print Satin No. 3, and Coco Rose.

Each batch varies. 

Sample Swatches are a 9-inch length sample of our 1.5-inch width ribbon.

Blue butterfly pea flower petals add a blue floral pattern—the perfect "Something Blue" to complete your wedding ensemble.

Each ribbon is a piece of original artwork. Each ribbon is unique, and markings vary.

• Wrap your bridal bouquets with naturally botanical printed plant-dyed silk ribbon

• Create unique gift-wrapping presentations

• Wrap your custom Wedding Invitation suites

Only available while supplies last, and then you'll have to wait until next Spring!!

Add this warm earthy sheer silk table runner to your wedding head table, sweetheart table, or cake display table.

body_html:

Blush is a soft earthy pink with coral undertones. 

Add a lasting touch to your special day with this beautiful Silk Handkerchief. This special piece is made of luxurious silk fabric, naturally and botanically dyed with a soft blush hue. Perfect for topping off a suit with a hint of color or to catch your tears of joy while standing at the aisle on your wedding day. With its soft and luxurious feel, the Silk Handkerchief provides a timeless elegance that will be cherished for years.

Experience softness and luxury in every touch—hand-dyed, slow-crafted botanical color.

title: Coral Canna {Gossamer}
body_html:
Introducing the wonderfully unique and luxurious Coral Canna Gossamer silk ribbon, inspired by the beautiful coral Canna Lily. This color is a balanced blend of warm coral and delicate rose tones that will seamlessly enhance any Spring or Summer bouquet. Add a touch of texture by layering it with our classic silk ribbons, or let it speak for itself as the stunning adornment to your bridal bouquet. Coral Canna Gossamer silk ribbon is an exquisite addition to your wedding flowers and eco-friendly - so you can feel confident in selecting a responsible, sustainable accessory for your special day. 

Sustainably gathered silk cocoons, known as "peace silk," are delicately spun and woven to produce this ethereal lightweight ribbon. Crafted from raw organic silk, naturally dyed and hand-loomed exclusively for Silk & Willow, this ribbon epitomizes sustainable luxury.

Sample Swatch is 9 inches; width varies.

title: Cinnamon {Gossamer}
body_html:
Cinnamon Gosamer silk ribbon is dreamy and elegant. This ribbon's soft coral hue will bring a delicate touch to any bridal bouquet. Whether you layer it with our classic silk ribbons for an added texture or showcase it on its own, this one-of-a-kind adornment is a must-have for any bride seeking a unique, elegant, and eco-friendly accessory for her wedding bouquet.

Sustainably gathered silk cocoons, known as "peace silk," are delicately spun and woven to produce this ethereal lightweight ribbon. Crafted from raw organic silk, naturally dyed and hand-loomed exclusively for Silk & Willow, this ribbon epitomizes sustainable luxury.

Sample Swatch is 9 inches; width varies.

title: Dove Gray Napkins / Fringe {Tight Weave}
body_html:
Dove Gray fringe napkins are the perfect natural hue, with a soft fringe on the ends. The tight, hand-loomed weave gives them the look of linen with easy cotton care.   

Used pressed for a more formal feel or tumbled dry for a relaxed look. 

Each color batch varies slightly.

Organic cotton, hand-loomed.

Approx. Size / 15 x 20 inches

title: Botanical Print Coreopsis | Organic Eri Silk Pillow Covers {Set of 2}
body_html:
Discover the lustrous beauty of our hand-woven silk pillow covers, crafted from ethical Eri silk. Sourced from the wild and harvested only once the moths have emerged; this "peace silk" is the epitome of sustainable luxury. With its natural sheen and unique knobby texture, this medium-weight fabric brings a touch of earthy luxury to any room. 

Slow-crafted colors, created with care and attention to detail. Infused with nature's finest botanical elements, coreopsis flowers make a soft coral base hue. Botanical prints of orange, yellow, and hints of blue-green are sprinkled throughout—flower markings are crafted from coreopsis, marigold petals, red rose petals, and chrysanthemum flowers.

Elevate your decor with these unique, eco-friendly designs that bring the beauty of the outdoors into your home.

Approx Pillow Cover Size | 18.5 x 19.5 inches. Pillow covers are hand-sewn by our team of artisans; slight variations in sizing are possible. The zipper closure is a light gray color. 

Pillow Covers do not include a pillow insert. Pillow inserts need to be purchased separately. The pillows pictured use a West Elm 20 x 20-inch pillow insert. Inserts must be purchased separately.

Pillow covers come folded in a silk organza bag. Perfect for gifting. They will require light ironing to remove creases. 

COLOR  | A soft golden-yellow base hue with blue and yellow botanical markings. 

Each piece is meticulously crafted in the same manner, but individual markings and patterns make every pillow cover a one-of-a-kind work of art. Markings can vary slightly from what is pictured. Botanical markings are dominant on one side, and a lighter reflection is visible on the reverse side.

CARE | Hand wash, spot clean, or naturally dry clean. Use only pH-neutral soap, such as Seventh Generation or other natural laundry soaps. NATURAL DYES ARE LIVING COLOR and pH SENSITIVE. Drastic changes in pH may alter natural dye colors. Lay flat or hang to dry. Iron on medium heat. Natural dyes are magical, but their colors can fade over time with direct sunlight. Limit sun exposure and embrace the subtle shifts in color over time.

title: Chocolate {Gossamer Silk Fabric}
body_html:
Chocolate is an earthy neutral hue.

This is a hand-loomed 100% silk fabric. The light airiness of our gossamer silk creates a transparent veil of color when used as a table cover or table runner on your table. The Chocolate color works well with many palettes; it's a grounding color. 

Our Chocolate Gossamer Silk Fabric has many uses!

• Use as a transparent layer to add a veil of texture to your table

• cut to size and use as gift wrapping

• cut into strips and make ribbons

• use as a sheer curtain or wall panel

SIZE / 42 inch width

Chocolate Gossamer Silk Fabric is plant dyed and hand-loomed from wild-harvested silk cocoons. This is Ahimsa silk, also known as "peace silk." 

This is a hand-loomed fabric, and due to the handmade nature, slight variations in the weave are always possible. It is perfectly imperfect.

CARE / dry clean only. Iron on medium heat to remove creases. NOTE, this material is ultra-delicate; handwashing can compromise the weave and texture. This material is intended for decorative purposes. 

This fabric is cut and sold by the yard. The fabric comes folded and will require ironing to remove creases.

title: Sea Scape {Ethereal} Silk Ribbon
body_html:
Our Sea Scape ribbon transports you to the tranquility and beauty of the tropical seas. Its delicate weight allows it to dance gracefully in a gentle breeze - creating an enchanting wave of magnificent color!

This Ethereal Silk is an ultra-lightweight silk with a delicate texture. The double dye process of this color has stressed this fine weave and created some irregularities. Dyed first in marigold flowers, then dip-dyed in our organic indigo vat, this is a marbled color transitioning from a yellow-green, teal, to blue. The imperfections in this ribbon add to the unique, custom feel. 

The ethereal, organic handwoven design offers a unique texture custom-made for Silk & Willow.  Use alone for a unique and delicate feel, or create layers of dimensional depth combined with our Classic Silk Ribbons.

Read more about our Ethereal Ribbons.

title: Fuchsia {Organza} Silk Ribbon | LIMITED BATCH
body_html:
Give your wedding day a truly magical touch with our striking, vibrant Fuchsia Sheer Organza ribbon! Our luxurious silk will give the perfect finishing touches to ensure the bride's bridal bouquet is nothing short of spellbinding. Accent it further with one of our Classic Silk Ribbons for an extra romantic layer – your special day will radiate in beauty and be forever remembered.

This ribbon's crisp weight and body bring a sheer layer of color to compliment any flower arrangement, creating a stunning visual addition to any special occasion.

title: Lily Silk Ribbon | LIMITED EDITION
body_html:
Introducing Lily, a light coral hue with subtle rose undertones and pink speckles reminiscent of the Oriental Lily. Bring an inviting touch to any palette this Spring and Summer with our limited-edition ribbon—the perfect floral accessory for your bouquets!

This soft hue is similar to our Cinnamon silk ribbon. A dusty coral-rose hue with a light marbling of shades that add a custom feel and depth to the color

We increased our production of 0.75-inch silk ribbons for all of our Stationery Designer friends looking for the perfect natural touch to their custom wedding invitation designs!!

Sample Swatches are a 9-inch length sample of our 1.5-inch width ribbon.

title: Soft White Handmade Paper
body_html:
NEW Handmade 100% recycled cotton paper with torn, deckled-like edging. 

Our Soft White Handmade Paper is eco-friendly and sure to add a personal touch to your custom wedding invitations. Crafted from 100% recycled cotton fibers, the paper's soft feel complements its deckled-like edging for a fine art look and feel. 

Please keep in mind subtle size variations and imperfections may occur due to our handmade practices - be sure you order 10-15% extra.

Note: We achieved successful results using our laser printer to print on this handmade paper. Laser printer manufacturing instructions sometimes advise not printing on handmade paper. Always follow your printer manufacturer's instructions. 

Due to size variation always test this paper with your chosen envelopes to ensure a proper fit.  This paper fits in our 3.5 x 5 envelopes and 5 x 7 envelopes.

Sizes and weights are approximate. Please, expect ¼ inch variance on all sizes.
Paper Size / 3.5 x 5 inches or 5 x 7 inches   |    Weight / 250gsm (weights can vary slightly)

title: Indigo Dyed 100% Silk Bags {Marbled Dusty Indigo}
body_html:
Our natural hand-dyed 100% silk bags are dip-dyed in our indigo vat for a marbling of dusty indigo hues. 

Silk bags are air-dried to create a natural crinkle and textured surface. Iron on medium heat to smooth the surface. 

Organza/gossamer silk bags are made from high-quality hand-loomed silk made exclusively for Silk & Willow & dyed in our New York dye studio. This material is textural silk which is sheer transparency. With a handmade silk drawstring, each bag is individually hand-made from hand-spun organic "ahimsa" silk. Due to the handmade nature, variations and imperfections should be expected. They are perfectly imperfect.

Expect slight variations in size and weave. You should account for a possible .5 inch variation in each direction.

Our silk bags can be used for: enveloping your invitation suite, holding small photo prints, little treasures, party favors, gifts, place card holders, petals, and more! Bags may require ironing to remove creases.

APPROX SIZE /  4 x 5 inches 
Inner space / 3.5 x 4 inches

title: Gift Card {Digital}
body_html:
Silk & Willow Digital Gift Card is the perfect gift for the bride-to-be, florist, artist, photographer, stylist, and nature lover in your life.

Gift cards are delivered as a coupon code via email. You can print it to give as a gift or forward the email to your recipient.

title: Indigo + Turmeric Swirl Silk Ribbon | two versions
body_html:
Indigo + Turmeric Swirl is a unique marbling of hues. Indigo blue and turmeric yellow swirl and combine to create an exciting palette of blue, teal, and yellow.  

We have two batches!

Batch #1 - Indigo and turmeric yellow swirled throughout

Batch #2- The same base hue with Indigo and Turmeric Swirl, with marigold flowers rolled and steamed into the silk. 

This unique ribbon is an elevated spin on an indigo tie-dye technique—an earthy hue complimenting your garden bouquet or ocean-inspired wedding theme.

title: Bohemian Blue Silk Ribbon
body_html:
Achieve a timelessly romantic look with Bohemian Blue -a chic and modern interpretation of tie-dye. Perfect for the contemporary Boho Bride looking to add that something special to her wedding bouquet.

Indigo-dyed Bohemian Blue provides an alluring and artistic touch, imparting a marbled look that's perfect for adding artistry and a special "something blue" to your wildflower bouquet or oceanic color palette.

Sample swatch is approximately 9 inches of 1.5" ribbon

title: Blaze Silk Ribbon
body_html:
Introducing "Blaze", a luxurious and unique red silk ribbon. This fiery ribbon boasts an intense orange undertone, delicately marbled with hints of darker hues for added depth and vibrancy - perfect for adding the wow factor to any bridal bouquet!

Sample Swatches are a 9-inch length sample of our 1.5-inch width ribbon.

title: Romantic Red Silk Ribbon
body_html:
Romantic Red is a passionate and optimistic hue that weaves together the strength of red with subtle pink undertones. This delicate medium-toned warm red has a romantic rosiness that links your bolder-toned flowers with softer shades, giving your bridal bouquet a truly harmonious feel.

Experience the inviting allure of Romantic Red. 

Sample swatch is approximately 9 inches of 1.5" ribbon

title: Imperial Blue Silk Ribbon
body_html:
Imperial Blue offers a regal experience, its deep royal shade shifting subtly between blue and periwinkle undertones. The marbling effect further enhances this luxurious experience - each variation is as unique as beautiful.

Pair with our Imperial Blue Sheer Silk to add a layer of texture.  

Sample Swatches are a 9-inch length sample of our 1.5-inch width ribbon.

title: Botanical Dyed Silk Handkerchief 12 x 12" {French Blue}
body_html:
100% Silk Handkerchief/ Pocket Square. 

French Blue is a soft place blue hue with gray undertones. 

Add a lasting touch to your special day with this beautiful Silk Handkerchief. This special piece is made of luxurious silk fabric, naturally and botanically dyed with a soft blush hue. Perfect for topping off a suit with a hint of color or to catch your tears of joy while standing at the aisle on your wedding day. With its soft and luxurious feel, the Silk Handkerchief provides a timeless elegance that will be cherished for years.

Experience softness and luxury in every touch—hand-dyed, slow-crafted botanical color.

Approx. Size | 12 x 12 inches

Machine-sewn hem with Silk & Willow logo tag.

Washable | Wash in cold water using pH neural natural laundry soap on a delicate wash cycle.

Notes | Color variations are always possible due to the natural dyeing process.

title: Botanical Print No. 95 Silk Ribbon
body_html:
If you're looking for a unique and beautiful ribbon that will add natural beauty to your wedding bouquet, look no further than our bridal bouquet silk ribbons.

No. 95 Botanical Print combines midnight blues and navy with warm marigold and deep blue hollyhock botanical prints.  

Silk & Willow botanical Print Ribbons create a one-of-a-kind art piece that perfectly complements your wedding bouquet flowers. We start with a vintage navy blue hue with a hint of periwinkle in the undertone; then, with our unique botanical steaming process, we create bold yellow and dark blue botanical prints from marigolds and hollyhock flowers. This ribbon creates a unique custom look like no other ribbon on the market.

Just like Botanical Print No. 94, this is an earthy blue ribbon with swirls and speckles, like the night sky, and with antiqued yellow flower prints throughout. The difference is that No. 95 has a slightly darker base hue and the addition of hollyhock flowers. 

Each ribbon is a piece of original artwork.

• Wrap your bridal bouquets with plant-dyed silk ribbon

• Create unique gift-wrapping presentations

• Invitation ribbon

• Frame as an art piece

Each ribbon is unique, and markings vary.

title: SILK RIBBON SECONDS | Assorted Colors
body_html:
Nature is perfectly imperfect!

Our ribbon “Seconds” collection is our plant-dyed silk ribbons that became slightly flawed somewhere in the production process. This may be frayed edging, extra seams, a loose bias seam, irregular width, spots of plant matter, an irregular spot, or maybe an irregularity in the weave. However, these slightly less-than-perfect ribbons can still work for bouquet wrapping (if there is a loose seam, it must be wrapped around the bouquet stems to remain hidden) and are great for styled shoots, gift wrapping, invitation wrapping, and more! Discounts vary depending on the degree of the flaw.

Each ribbon is sold separately & priced accordingly.

title: Antique White Table Cover 104-inch Width
body_html:
Our Antique White hue exudes timeless sophistication and elegance, making it the perfect choice to create an enchanting atmosphere for your special day. Hand-loomed Silk & Willow cotton textiles masterfully blend subtlety with complexity - a luxury addition to any sustainable wedding decor! Place our Tight Weave fabric on tablescapes throughout your big event; from cake tables to seating areas, you can drape this captivating material across all surfaces and bring added warmth and texture into every corner of the room.

Sustainable luxury meets special event magic as Silk & Willow table covers create an atmosphere of warmth and beauty perfect for enchanting your guests on one of life’s most memorable occasions - your wedding day!

See our book, NATURAL TABLES, or our INSPIRATION blog post HERE to learn more about creating this tablescape. 

NOTE /  This table cover is not opaque. If you need to camouflage the table underneath, you will need an additional layer or a standard tablecloth as a base layer. 

For additional quantities or sizes, please contact us Here

Approx. Width / 104-inches

This item takes extra time to prepare and process. Please expect three days to process your order before it ships. Contact us for rush orders.

title: Silk Hair Scrunchie Set {Blush + Dove Gray}
body_html:
100% SILK SATIN • SUSTAINABLE COLOR •  ALL NATURAL • PLASTIC-FREE!

SET INCLUDES Two MEDIUM size scrunchies

• (1) Blush / Dyed with cutch, madder root, and pomegranate
• (1) Dove Gray / Dyed with walnuts

Our new scrunchies contain all-natural, GOTS Certified (plastic-free!) elastic, made from 65% organic cotton and 35%   natural rubber from Fair Trade rubber plantations.

Rest easy and say goodbye to hair breakage with our consciously created Silk Satin Hair Scrunchies.

Our Zero Waste hair scrunchies are made with luxury and sustainability in mind!

Made from the highest quality bridal silk botanically dyed in our Hudson Valley studio and locally hand-sewn.

Scrunchies come tucked in our hand-loomed, hand-sewn organic silk organza bag.

title: Copper {Sheer Silk Runner}
body_html:
COPPER.

A copper-ginger hue. 

Use your sheer silk table runner to make a custom look on your special event table, wedding head table, or wedding cake table.

Approx. Width / 42 inches

title: NEW- Botanical Dyed Hair Scrunchies {Large}
body_html:
SUSTAINABLE COLOR + ALL NATURAL, 100% SILK SATIN + PLASTIC-FREE!

Our Zero Waste hair scrunchies are made with luxury and sustainability in mind!

Made from the highest quality bridal silk, botanically dyed in our Hudson Valley studio, and locally hand-sewn. Our new hair scrunchies have a sewn-in Silk & Willow tag to show off your commitment to sustainable color!

These scrunchies contain all-natural, GOTS Certified elastic, made from 65% organic cotton and 35% natural rubber from Fair Trade rubber plantations.

Rest easy and say goodbye to hair breakage with our consciously created Silk Satin Hair Scrunchies.

Each is sold separately; choose from- 


Botanical Print Blushing Rose | A blush-rose hue creates the base hue. Marigolds, dahlias, tansy, and tulip petals are the main botanicals, but bits and pieces from our assortment of dried petals are sprinkled in the mix. 

Botanical Print Magenta | A magenta base dyed with cochineal and madder roots. Loads of botanical prints are created from marigolds, dahlias, and peonies, with the addition of a few coreopsis, tulips, and delphinium. 

Botanical Print Confetti | A confetti of botanicals! This pillowcase starts with a blush base hue, and after steaming the botanical prints into the silk, a golden undertone shines through. Sprinkles of flowers are seen throughout. Shades of yellows, oranges, and blue petals from marigolds, dahlias, delphinium, tulips, irises, and daffodils, make fun and cheerful botanical patterns.

Botanical Print Coreopsis | A caramel-champagne hue made from walnuts creates the base hue. A combination of fresh and dried coreopsis flowers makes a beautiful botanical pattern throughout.

Botanical Print Indigo + Coreopsis | A teal blue base hue is dyed with fresh-grown indigo leaves and then steamed with fresh and dried coreopsis flowers. 

Scrunchies come tucked in our hand-loomed, hand-sewn organic silk organza bag.

title: Hand-carved Primitive Bowl
body_html:
A Silk & Willow exclusive; hand-carved wooden bowl crafted from sustainable acacia wood. These unique pieces have a primitive charm, perfect for embellishing your snack station and the flat bottoms make each bowl sturdy enough to hold pillar candles!

Create an enchanting fairy garden by adding moss, dried fungi, and some crystals.

title: Botanical Print Naturally Dyed Silk Pillowcase / COLORFUL DREAM
body_html:
The benefits of a good night's sleep are undeniable. There is no better way to enhance your relaxation than with the soft, smooth, and luxurious feel of silk against your skin when you go to bed.

In addition to the wonderful tactile experience of silk on your skin, a silk pillowcase is an essential component of your hair and skincare routine. Silk is naturally hypoallergenic, and unlike cotton, the smooth surface of silk creates less friction— think of fewer wrinkles and split ends!

______________________________________________

We believe the essence of botanicals imbues benefits beyond just beauty. According to folk medicine practitioners and Ayurvedic doctors, our skin, the single largest organ of the body, protects and absorbs substances through connection. This is why we only use organic botanicals to dye our silk pillowcases.
_______________________________________________

Botanical Print Colorful Dream | A confetti of botanicals! This pillowcase starts with a blush base hue, and after steaming the botanical prints into the silk, a golden undertone shines through. Sprinkles of flowers are seen throughout. Shades of yellows, oranges, and blue petals from marigolds, dahlias, delphinium, tulips, irises, and daffodils, make fun and cheerful botanical patterns.



Botanical dyes are magical and always impart their special characteristics. Each pillowcase is a unique piece of botanical art; no two are alike. Please expect slight variations in colors and patterns. Nature is perfectly imperfect, and random markings may occur. 

Our mission in creating our high-quality silk pillowcases is that they may benefit your well-being in addition to adding beauty to your home. Not all silk is created equal! We use the most luxurious, 100% chemical-free, bridal-quality silk for our pillowcases. 

Each Pillowcase comes tied with a silk ribbon & tucked into our handmade 100% silk organza bags. A perfect treat for yourself or gift-giving!

SILK WEIGHT | 19mm

Size | Standard/Queen 20 x 30 inches

GRADE A 100% MULBERRY SILK

MADE IN THE USA

title: 100% Silk Satin Klecksography Scarf  {Woodgrain 001}
body_html:
DIGITALLY PRINTED

Size | 35 x 35 inches - 87 x 87 cm

Produced as a replica of Shellie's original art, "Woodgrain Walnut."

INSPIRED BY NATURE. This original pattern was created using natural ink from locally foraged walnuts.

Shellie artfully infused color into silk using a technique she has mastered over the past 10 years, creating our "Woodgrain Walnut" design.  We've digitally replicated this artwork and mirrored the pattern. This method of mirroring, known as Klecksography, reflects natural patterns to stimulate imagination and creativity. Klecksography is traced back to the late 1400s when Leonardo da Vinci and Boticelli used it. Symmetry is a powerful stimulant, leading us to see meaningful patterns in random markings. 

The scarf pattern may evoke images of a bird, butterfly, or divine figure. Embrace your imagination!

Experience the merging of history and innovation. 

Your scarf comes folded and presented in our hand-loomed, hand-sewn, organic silk bag. The perfect gift presentation! Use your silk scarf as a neck accessory, hair wrap, or tying on your purse to add texture and pattern to your fashion ensemble. 


After years of researching the most sustainably sound method of reproducing our original botanical prints, we've finally done it!

Silk Satin Klecksography Scarf / Sustainability Standard 

  • Grade A 100% Mulberry Silk Satin
  • OEKO-TEX ® Standard 100
  • Fair Trade / Social Responsibility & Charitable Responsibility 
  • Zero Waste + No harmful chemicals

Digitally printed and manufactured with strict Environment and Social Standards.

CARE | Machine washable. Wash on a delicate cycle of cold water. Use silk detergent or natural pH-neutral laundry detergent such as Seventh Generation. Hang to dry—iron on the back side of the scarf with medium heat or your iron silk setting. Or dry clean.

title: Indigo Crochet Doily
body_html:
EACH IS SOLD SEPARATELY.

Hours and hours went into crocheting these beautifully intricate cotton doilies. Hand crochet by a master at her craft, Johanne Johnson. Handcrafted to be an heirloom piece that's treasured for generations.

Hand-dyed in the Silk & Willow studio in our organic indigo vat. 

A sweet "something blue" to be placed under a flower centerpiece or on your welcome table. 

Care | Wash separately as the indigo may bleed in the first few washing. Wash by hand or in the washing machine in cold water on a delicate cycle. Use only pH-neutral soap such as Seventh Generation. Hang or lay flat to dry.

title: Antique White {Sheer} Silk Ribbon
body_html:
Classic bridal white. Our Antique White is subtle, yet complex. 

Virtuous, pure, immaculate, "white". While seemingly simple, there are a vast array of "white" hues. The perfect "white" is a delicate balance between color and the absence of color. This sheer ribbon is light and airy. Only the slightest amount of walnuts and a bit of alchemy are needed to create this soft natural "white" hue. 

Note / Our current batch of sheer silk ribbons is lighter-weight sheer silk than past batches.

body_html:
CLAY is the balance between cool and warm gray. Depending on the surrounding colors and how the daylight hits it, this ribbon may appear cool or warm.

This light, romantic, neutral hue pairs well with any palette. 

This is a limited edition ribbon, crafted from the same light sheer silk fabric as our sheer silk table runners. Use alone to add a floaty veil of color, or add to our classic ribbons for a sheer layer of texture. Works beautifully tied on your bridal bouquet, or tied on wedding programs and vow books.

title: Mystic Blue {Gossamer} Silk Ribbon
body_html:

This is a crisp, light, and ethereal silk ribbon. The edging is a clean-cut edge but can be hand-frayed for a new look. 

Organic hand-spun silk. Peace silk.

Dyed with indigo. Indigo is the most recognized natural dye throughout history. This divine hue holds deep meaning and tradition spanning many cultures. Indigo is a precious dye pigment, and we use only the purest quality. 

Due to the delicate nature of this silk ribbon, expect variations in the weave and width. This ribbon is perfectly imperfect and adds a natural and ethereal look when used to wrap your bridal bouquet.

title: Ochre {Gossamer} Silk Ribbon

Organic hand-spun silk. Peace silk.

Due to the delicate nature of this silk ribbon, expect variations in the weave and width. This ribbon is perfectly imperfect and adds a natural and ethereal look when used to wrap your bridal bouquet.

title: Smooth Handmade Paper  {Black}
body_html:
Handmade 100% recycled cotton paper with torn, deckled-like edging. 

Our Smooth Handmade Papers are made from recycled, short cotton fibers; this makes the paper smoother, softer, and more delicate. Due to the recycled nature, imperfections and size variations can be expected. Always order at least 10-15% more than you need. 

Sizes are approximate. Please, expect ¼ inch variance on all sizes.

SIZES /  3.5 x 5 inches or 5 x 7 inches      

Color / Black

Weight / 320gsm

Texture / smooth

This paper fits in our 3.5 x 5 envelopes and 5 x 7 envelopes.

Note: We achieved successful results with laser printing on this handmade paper. Always review your printer manufacturing instructions before using handmade papers in your printer. We love Ghost White Toner for laser printing white ink on this black paper. 

The ideal printing method is letterpress printing. Contact us for printer referrals. 

This paper has a soft texture that may snag on sharp-tipped calligraphy pens.

Due to this product's recycled and handmade nature, speckles or fragments of other colors may be present in the pulp.

title: Rosewood Silk Ribbon
body_html:

For your event, pair with our Rosewood Tight Weave Table Runners.

title: Botanical Print No. 79 Silk Ribbon
body_html:
Create a unique display on your bridal bouquet with botanical print ribbons.

Burgundy and yellow Iris, Dyers Chamomile, and a few marigolds, all grown in our garden, are rolled into the silk and steamed to create an array of botanical prints. Blue markings come from the burgundy in the irises! After the markings are created, the silk returns to a dye bath of vibrant yellow-green created with a combination of blue and yellow pigments. 

While all ribbons come from the same dye bath, the differences between each ribbon can be quite drastic. The number of markings on each ribbon can vary from a few markings to a watercolor of yellow and blue prints. See images for a range of possible botanical prints. 

Each ribbon is unique and markings vary on each ribbon.

A unique adornment for your custom bridal bouquet.

title: Wood Styling Dish {Willow or Acacia} Set of 3
body_html:
SOLD IN SETS OF THREE BOWLS in a walnut-dyed SILK BAG.

Our handmade Wood Styling Dishes are great for your wedding flatlay styling or food styling.

Use as a ring dish or to hold dried botanicals, or use as a kitchen prep bowl and to hold dips, nuts, and other foods on your grazing platters and boards. 

Comes as a set of three bowls in our walnut-dyed organic silk bag.

CHOOSE FROM:
  • ACACIA WOOD - darker wood 
  • WILLOW WOOD - lighter wood

Handmade by our artisan friends in Pakistan (same woodworkers that crafted our original wooden spools). Sourced from sustainable wood sources. Each is handmade and perfectly imperfect. 

Wood is seasoned with natural beeswax oil. Hand-wash with mild dish soap and hand-dry. Whenever the bowl becomes dry, reseason it: Use a towel to liberally apply a natural wood oil, Let stand for 15 minutes, then wipe away the residue with a towel.

Bowl approx. size / 4-inches round & 1-inch tall

body_html:
Golden {Tussar} is a hand-loomed raw silk ribbon. Golden is a light gold hue with a natural shimmer. This ribbon is light, airy, and feather-weight.

Created from silk cocoons sustainably gathered from deep within a protected forest in eastern India. Artisans from a small village, rich in the craft of hand-looming, have created this material with skill and tradition that has been passed down for hundreds of years. 

This unique ribbon has a beautiful natural sheen. The edges are cut clean, but are very delicate and can be easily frayed for a soft feathery feel. This ribbon is bias cut to create a natural flow and drape. 

Organic, Ahimsa Silk (peace silk)

NOTE / Due to the hand-loom nature slight variations in the material and weave are always possible. Dyed in a dye bath of marigold flowers. Due to the delicate nature of this material, it was difficult to remove some of the flecks of flower pieces that may be stuck in the material.

title: Dove Silk Ribbon
body_html:
Are you looking for the perfect way to add a hint of color to your wedding day look? Look no further than Dove bridal bouquet silk ribbon. This subtle, warm "off-white" hue is a  complex color with an understated elegance, making it the perfect accent for your wedding flowers. This is a white hue with a warm hint of color. A perfect pairing with any palette. Dove plant-dyed silk ribbon adds a touch of elegance to your bridal bouquet!

Dove silk ribbon is a shade darker than Antique White silk ribbon. See the second image to see how it compares to our Antique White silk ribbon.

Note | Our current batch of Dove is slightly lighter than our last batch of ribbons.

Sample Swatches are a 9-inch length sample of our 1.5-inch width ribbon.

title: Botanical Print Gold Marigold | Organic Eri Silk Pillow Covers
body_html:
Discover the lustrous beauty of our hand-woven silk pillow covers, crafted from ethical Eri silk. Sourced from the wild and harvested only once the moths have emerged; this "peace silk" is the epitome of sustainable luxury. With its natural sheen and unique knobby texture, this medium-weight fabric brings a touch of earthy opulence to any room. 

Each pillow cover is naturally dyed with organically grown marigold flowers, tulip petals, and dahlia flowers. 

Approx Pillow Cover Size | 18.5 x 19.5 inches. Our pillow covers are hand-sewn by our team of artisans, so slight variations in sizing are possible. The zipper color is a light gray color. 

Pillow Covers are sold separately and require a pillow insert.

The pillows pictured use a West Elm 20 x 20-inch pillow insert. Inserts must be purchased separately.

COLOR  | A golden yellow base hue with gold and amber flower markings, and a few blue botanical markings sprinkled throughout.

EACH PILLOW COVER IS SOLD SEPARATELY. Each pillow cover is one-of-a-kind. While each pillow cover had the same "feel" each one is unique and markings vary. 

Pillow covers do not include the pillow inserts. Pillow covers come folded in a silk organza bag. Perfect for gifting. Will require light ironing to remove creases. 

CARE | Hand wash, spot clean, natural dry clean, or machine wash on a delicate cycle with a cold water setting. Use only pH-neutral soap, such as Seventh Generation or other natural brands. Lay flat to dry. Iron on medium heat.

The organic shapes and the touch of hand creates a beautiful piece of art that is perfectly imperfect, just like nature. Visit Savva's online shop for their signature "Styling Surfaces" featured in many of our images.

title: Fuchsia Silk Ribbon
body_html:

A subtle marbling of hues adds depth of color, making this ribbon truly unique. Speckles from the natural dye material can be seen on each ribbon, adding to the handmade nature of each silk ribbon. These slow-crafted, saturated hues take days to develop.

Choose from DARK FUCHSIA or LIGHT FUCHSIA or pair together for a beautiful ombre of hues.

Set includes

(4) Palo Santo Wood Sticks 

(1) Hand-thrown Ceramic Smudge Bowl, black


Wild White Sage, Salvia apiana, or white sacred sage is an evergreen shrub native to the Southwest, widely used by Native Americans in various ceremonies.
Equally effective at filling your apartment with a cleansing, calming aroma.

Paolo Santo. Sustainably harvested, certified by the National Forest Service and Wildlife of Peru, High resin Palo Santo Natura (Bursera graveolens).

Smudge Bowl. Hand-thrown, in-house glaze mixing, wood-fired stoneware smudge bowls, made in NY.

title: Cinnamon Silk Ribbon
body_html:
Step into a dreamy world that exudes warmth and nostalgia with Cinnamon Silk Ribbon - a stunning dusty coral hue. Its heirloom feel is perfect for adding a touch of sophistication to any wedding bouquet. Crafted from nature, this hue is a master at harmonizing with all flowers, especially garden roses, dahlias, peonies, tulips, and ranunculus. 

Ditch the ordinary, and embrace the warmth of this alluring hue - it's a perfect addition to your wedding celebration.

Each batch varies. The current batch of Cinnamon may have slight marbling.

The color Cinnamon is an earthy coral hue. Pair with Sedona and Blushing rose for a show-stopping ensemble.

title: NATURAL TABLES, Nature-Inspired Tablescapes for Memorable Gatherings
body_html:
Learn to create dazzling tablescapes inspired by nature’s beauty with this essential guide to styling stunning tablescapes for any occasion. 

Discover endless inspiration for stunning table settings. Brimming with inspired table spreads and simple-to-follow tips for incorporating crowd-pleasing recipes and lovely details into every presentation, this gorgeous coffee table book makes it easy to host warm, memorable gatherings—whether you’re putting together a cozy brunch, a themed cocktail hour, or a festive holiday party.

Photographs of exquisite table settings are paired with helpful styling tips—including picking your theme and color palette, selecting the right tableware, and incorporating nature’s bounty—plus simple-to-follow food and drink recipes that guarantee the spreads taste as good as they look.

Readers will discover a botanical-themed cocktail cart, an ethereal ocean-inspired setting, a harvest table celebrating autumnal colors, and much more.


GIFT WORTHY: Brimming with hundreds of inspired photographs captured by internationally acclaimed photographer Corbin Gurkin, this book makes a beautiful statement on any coffee table or bookshelf and is a lovely gift for new homeowners, newlyweds, nature lovers, and design enthusiasts.

Shellie signs each book.
vendor: Shellie Pomeroy / Photography by Corbin Gurkin

title: Ballerina Pink {Dupioni} Silk Ribbon

Create a classic or modern look with this thick, crisp ribbon. Works well wrapped and pinned around your florals, creating a clean drape of trailing ribbons. 

Hand-spun silk threads are hand-loomed to create the thick and textured pattern of Dupioni silk. With a beautiful and luxurious matte finish and variations in the nobby threads, this ribbon brings luxury to sustainable floristry.

organic, peace silk

title: Seafoam Gray {Ethereal} Silk Ribbon

Seafoam Gray {Ethereal} is an earthy gray-green hue with blue undertones. Earthy elegance comes from the matte texture and natural shimmer of our raw organic silk. This unique hue, only achieved through extracting color from flowers, adds a magical texture and a custom look to your bridal bouquet or over-the-top gift wrapping. 

Our hand-loomed "ethereal" ribbon is custom-made and exclusive to Silk & Willow. This ribbon has a light and airy weight with a natural shimmer. This ribbon adds a unique texture to your bridal bouquet, to your gift-wrapping, and when tying together your wedding invitation suite. Our "ethereal" ribbons are soft and very delicate! It's the perfectly imperfect nature of the material which adds to the uniqueness! Expect variations in weave and width. Each batch varies. Limited supply, available while supplies last.

Ahimsa, peace silk.

title: Wedding Head Table / Sheer Silk Table Overlay {Antique White}
body_html:
CUSTOM ORDER

Make a statement with our plant-dyed, 100% sheer silk table overlay. 

Our sheer silk overlay is designed to create a sheer veil of flowing silk on top of your Wedding Head Table or Milestone Event Celebration.

Opulence, luxury, and the sustainability of natural color add to the moments of your special day. 

ONLY FOUND HERE at SILK & WILLOW

Silk & Willow sheer silk overlays are naturally hand-dyed in our Hudson Valley Studio, then hand-stitched by a master seamstress in the NYC fashion district. Three silk panels are stitched together to create a full-coverage table overlay. There will be two seams on your silk overlay, each outlining the edge of the table. The width of the inner panel can be customized to your table depth. 

Width / 123 inches, (3.42 yards, 3.1 meters)

Length varies.

Once ordered allow 2-4 weeks for shipment. Contact us if there is a time urgency. There will be a rush fee added to urgent orders required in less time.

To order a custom-length Silk Table Overlay, contact us here.

title: COLORS / HANDMADE  PAPER / 8.5 x 11
body_html:
This handmade paper offers a soft romantic touch to your invitation suites, program covers, vow books, menus, name cards, and more! Cut or tear to size to suit any size requirements.

Handmade 100% recycled cotton paper with deckled edging. Acid-free.

Size | 8 ½ x 11 inches. Size variations and imperfections may occur because each paper is individually handcrafted with recycled materials. It's rare, but flecks of other colors could be present in your paper, this adds to the unique nature. Expect 1/4- 1/2 inch variance on all sides. The size is a guide, and each sheet varies. Some of the edgings may be uneven, "wildly deckled."

Each Color Pack- 10 sheets

The Assortment Pack Includes 6 sheets: Cotton, Celadon, Coastal Gray, Misty Blue, Charcoal, and Black.

Weight / 200gsm   |   Texture / smooth

__________________________________________________

Printing | This handmade paper works with letterpress printing, inkjet printing, and hand calligraphy.
Printing Note | While I can not recommend laser printing due to the manufacturer's requirements for each printer, we have used laser printing with beautiful results. This is perfect for last-minute projects! Due to the deckled edging, this paper does not fit in a standard 8 ½ x 11-inch tray; when using it in the printer, you will need to cut or tear ¼ -½ inch off one edge to feed through your printer as an 8 ½ x 11 sheet. All printing pictured is printed with an HP Color LaserJet Pro M452nw.
DISCLAIMER | We take no responsibility for paper or printing issues due to using this paper in your laser printer—experiment at your own risk.

See Also Botanical Print Line Art

For Details on Printing with White Toner, visit our JOURNAL

title: Natural White Peace Silk {Organza Silk Fabric}
body_html:
Natural White Peace Silk {Organza Silk Fabric} is an un-dyed organic "organza" silk fabric. This fabric is hand-loomed from wild-harvested silk cocoons. This is Ahimsa silk, also known as "peace silk.” The light airiness of this silk creates a transparent silk veil in various applications. This material has a slight stiffness that gives it a "body."

Note | Due to this product's delicate weave and handmade nature, there may be irregularities in the weave. This is a perfectly imperfect textile. 

Due to the delicate nature of this fabric, it is intended for decorative purposes.

  • Use as a transparent layer to add a veil of texture to your table
  • Use to decorate/ prop styling
  • Use as a transparent decorative wall panel
  • Add a veil of texture to your windows
  • Cut to size and use as gift wrapping
  • Cut into strips and make ribbon
Width / 43 inches

Sold by the yard. Multiple yards come continuous.

________________________________________________

Hand-loomed in homes using pit looms. Supporting the continuation of traditional looming methods passed down through generations. We work directly with our spinners and weavers to develop unique, sustainable fabrics. Handmade in India. 
CARE / dry clean preferred, or hand wash. Iron on medium heat to remove creases. NOTE, this material is ultra-delicate; hand washing can compromise the weave and texture. 
This fabric is cut and sold by the yard. Edges may be trimmed slightly unevenly, and a 1/4 yard is added on each piece to accommodate this.  The fabric comes folded and will require ironing to remove creases.

body_html:
A classic French Blue hue. A blue crafted from nature, is like no other.

This beautiful soft blue is created with a bit of alchemy and the color extracted from Peruvian Purple Corn. This natural dye is sensitive to the sun and time, and the intensity of the hue may fade over time. Enjoy this unique hue now, and as it changes over the years.

Note/ darker streaks may be present as a result of settled dyestuff in the dye pot. 

For the bride looking for a special "something blue". 

Don't miss our classic  French Blue, also dyed with purple corn.

title: ARPA ENVELOPES {light gray}
body_html:
ARPA ENVELOPES - Deckled Edge Handmade Envelopes

These lovely deckled edge envelopes are of the highest quality & handmade by artisans in Spain. ARPA uses traditional papermaking techniques and gives the utmost attention to the craft of each piece they create. Designed to be used with our Silk & Willow handmade Papers.

Cotton / Bleach-free

Color / Light gray is a neutral gray hue 

NOTE / These envelopes do not have “gum” to seal them closed. They will require glue, double-sided tape, or wax seal to seal them closed. 

Size / with handmade items slight variations are always possible, but we find the envelopes to be very consistent.  

Printing / Letterpress, offset printing, or hand calligraphy. Compatible with home Ink-jet printer. We have used laser printing with Arpa envelopes but the results are varied, we do not recommend using laser printing unless you do your own testing. 

ENVELOPES
3.875 x 5.5 inches - to pair with our 3 x 5 paper
4.5 x 6.875 inches - to pair with our 4 x 6 paper
5.5 x 7.875 inches - to pair with our 5 x 7 paper

title: PAPER / 8.5 x 11
body_html:
Handmade 100% recycled cotton rag paper with deckled edging.

Handmade 100% recycled cotton rag paper with deckled edging. 

Genuine rag papers are rare and it's the fiber length of this raw material that gives our paper its exceptional strength and durability. Made from recycled t-shirt cuttings. Acid and bleach-free. Slight size variations and imperfections may occur due to the nature that each paper & envelope is individually handcrafted by artisans in Asia using only recycled materials.

title: Blush {Sheer} Silk Ribbon
body_html:
Romantic, playful, feminine Blush. Our Blush hues are created with a unique balance of Madder Root, Pomegranate, and Cutch. This collection of plant materials combines pink, gold, and brown to create a sophisticated, natural "blush" tone. Love and romance are in the air with this classic bridal hue! 

NOTE/ Our current batch has a bit more "coral" in the undertones and less "pink" than pictured. This is a darker-toned "Blush."

title: Charcoal {Medium Weave Runner}
body_html:
CHARCOAL is a medium-dark silvery gray. This medium gray tone is just slightly lighter than "Dark Charcoal." 

Approx. Width / 26 inches

title: Antique Gold Silk Ribbon
body_html:
Antique Gold Silk Ribbon provides a timeless elegance with the delicate touch of gold. Crafted using pomegranates - historically renowned for their divine nectar and symbolic associations- to love and courage. This softly muted hue is perfect for pulling out the light golden tones in floral wedding bouquets and beautifully balances your vibrant yellow blooms. 

Sample Swatches are a 9-inch length sample of our 1.5-inch width ribbon.

title: Twine / Organic Nettle Skein
body_html:
Organic Nettle Twine is grown naturally in the wild, and hand spun using all parts of the plant. All parts of the nettle plant are used in the production of our twine, so shades can vary. Colors can vary slightly between a brown and gray-brown color.

Perfect for tags, favors, and invitations.

weight approx. / 20-25 grams
yardage approx. / 45 yards

title: Blush Napkins / Finished Edge {Tight Weave}
body_html:
Highlight your special day with the breathtaking beauty of Blush! This romantic and feminine hue is an ideal choice for a timeless wedding look or any intimate occasion. Our hand-loomed textiles provide luxurious texture and intricate details that are masterfully crafted to give you just enough color and texture to make any celebration feel truly one-of-a-kind.  

Approximate Size // 18 x 28 inches.

title: Chocolate {Gossamer} Silk Ribbon
body_html:
Chocolate is a brown hue, but the light airiness of the "gossamer" ribbon creates a transparent layer of this earthy color. "Chocolate" works well with many palettes, as it grounds your bold flowers, making the colors "pop" but also adds a soft accent to creamy champagne, chocolate, rose, and burgundy blooms. 

Ahimsa silk.

title: Botanical Print MARIGOLD Silk Ribbon
body_html:
Marigold yellow, the color of peace, courage, and knowledge. This vibrant, bold hue will lift your spirits and emanate happiness!

BOTANICAL MARIGOLD is created using marigold flowers of varying colors and varieties, using the "direct contact" dyeing method where the whole flowers are rolled into the silk. This dyeing method creates a truly unique ribbon where each and every ribbon is one-of-a-kind.

NOTE | Patterns, markings, and tones vary on each ribbon.

title: Sapphire {Indigo} Silk Ribbon
body_html:
Sapphire is a deep rich saturated blue. While each batch varies slightly in intensity, this is our most saturated indigo hue! Classic and true, this blue is the perfect "something blue" for any bridal style. 

Naturally dyed with indigo. Indigo, is the most recognized natural dye throughout history. This divine hue holds deep meanings and traditions spanning many cultures. Indigo is a precious pigment, for some cultures symbolizing wealth and for others a connection to the elements of water and sky. 

NOTE/ We currently have two batches of our Sapphire silk ribbons. One is slightly lighter with some marbling, and the other is the same hue, without the light marbling of shades. If you have a strong preference for a particular batch please let us know in the notes at checkout. We will honor your selection if it is available. We will match like colors when possible if multiple sizes are ordered. 

Sample Swatches are a 9-inch length sample of our 1.5-inch width ribbon.

title: Pebble Gray {Tight Weave Runner}
body_html:
PEBBLE GRAY s a light gray. Though Pebble Gray is neutral in nature and works well with both warm and cool palettes. 

Pictured below with our Pebble Gray Medium Weave Table Runner and Charcoal Napkins.

Approx. Width / 28-30 inches

title: Antique White {Sheer Silk Runner}
body_html:
Our Antique White is a timeless hue, combining elements of subtlety and complexity. Our luxurious sheer silk weaves an opulent fabric that flows effortlessly with its airy grace. Perfect for brides aiming to create the ultimate dream wedding day look!

Drape our sheer silks on your wedding tables, cake tables, wedding arches, or home decor. 

Approx. Width / 42 inches

Larger orders are made-to-order. Please Contact us for custom sizes or rush orders.

Our sheer silks come air-dried with a natural texture. Iron on silk setting or medium heat for a smoother finish and to remove folds and creases as needed.

title: Twine / Organic Tussar & Eri Silk
body_html:
10 yards per/spool

TUSSAR & ERI blend twine is a thin multi-textured handspun silk twine. This multi-colored & textured silk twine is a contrast between a soft off-white eri silk & rough, raw brown tussar silk.

Comes wound on a hand-carved, raw wood antique-style spool. 

Each of our silk twines is created from silk cocoons sustainably gathered from a protected forest in eastern India. The cocoons are gathered after the moths have left the cocoon, so this silk twine would also be referred to as "peace" silk or Ahimsa silk {meaning: "nonviolence"}. Each part of the cocoon is used, creating no waste. The varying textures and widths reflect the varying parts of the cocoon.

title: Dove {Sheer Silk Runner}
body_html:
DOVE is a soft warm & creamy tone. Hand-dyed with black walnuts. Just a hint more color than our "Antique White" sheer silk.


Approx. Width /  40 inches

title: Twine / Organic Tussar & Mulberry Silk
body_html:
8 yards per/spool

TUSSAR & MULBERRY SILK twine is a thick-weight handspun silk twine. This multi-colored twine has dark golden browns wound with black. The thickness varies and has the look of "dreadlocks". This is a surprisingly strong twine. Adds texture and character to wrappings or tags.

Each of our silk twines is created from silk cocoons sustainably gathered from a protected forest in eastern India. The cocoons are gathered after the moths have left the cocoon, so this silk twine would also be referred to as "peace" silk or Ahimsa silk {meaning: "nonviolence"}. Each part of the cocoon is used, creating no waste. The varying textures and widths reflect the varying parts of the cocoon. 

Each spool holds 8 yards

title: Twine / Organic Katia Silk
body_html:
10 yards per/spool

KATIA SILK twine is a medium-weight handspun silk twine. This multi-colored knotty twine varies in thickness and is fragile. Beautiful as an accent or wrapping to create texture. Not strong enough on its own to firmly hold items together, but creates a beautiful accent when tied around a single invitation. 

Comes wound on a hand-carved, raw wood antique-style spool. 

Each of our silk twines is created from silk cocoons sustainably gathered from a protected forest in eastern India. The cocoons are gathered after the moths have left the cocoon, so this silk twine would also be referred to as "peace" silk or Ahimsa silk {meaning: "nonviolence"}. Each part of the cocoon is used, creating no waste. The varying textures and widths reflect the varying parts of the cocoon.

title: Twine / Organic Nassi Silk
body_html:
10 yards per/spool

NASSI SILK twine is an ultra-thin handspun silk twine with a knotty texture and variations in thickness. This multi-colored twine is unique and fragile. Beautiful as an accent or wrapping to create texture. Not strong enough on its own to firmly hold items together.

Each of our silk twines is created from silk cocoons sustainably gathered from a protected forest in eastern India. The cocoons are gathered after the moths have left the cocoon, so this silk twine would also be referred to as "peace" silk or Ahimsa silk {meaning: "nonviolence"}. Each part of the cocoon is used, creating no waste. The varying textures and widths reflect the varying parts of the cocoon.

title: Antique White Silk Ribbon
body_html:
Looking for the perfect white to compliment your wedding dress? Look no further than our Antique White bridal bouquet silk ribbon. This delicate hue is subtle yet complex, lending a touch of luxury to your big day. Our high-quality materials and meticulous slow-crafted dyeing process ensure that your wedding bouquet will be adorned with the highest quality silk in the perfect white hue. Antique White bridal bouquet silk ribbon helps you create a wedding that is both timeless and unique.

Sample Swatches are a 9-inch length sample of our 1.5-inch width ribbon.

title: Twine / Organic Hemp
body_html:
10 yards per/spool.

HEMP TWINE is a light-colored "grassy" twine. It is rough & textured. 

Comes wound on a hand-carved, raw wood antique-style spool. 

Our hemp twine is completely natural, made without the use of chemicals or machines. The hemp plants are grown and harvested in remote mountainous areas and are spun by hand in Nepal. This twine has a natural and rustic appeal. The handspun nature makes this twine vary slightly in texture and color.

Perfect for tags, wrapping, and favors.

title: Blush Silk Ribbon
body_html:
Blush silk ribbon is a Romantic, playful, feminine Blush hue.

A handcrafted color made with a unique blend of plant materials to create a warm, earthy, blush hue with the slightest pink undertone. 

Love and romance are in the air with this classic bridal hue! 

Each batch varies slightly in tone. 

Sample Swatches are a 9-inch length sample of our 1.5-inch width ribbon.
